definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: It has always been the universal phenomenon to against the Southeast Asia Ethnic Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 反華排華一直是東南亞的普遍性現象。

sentences.english: We believe that the visit further exposes the anti-China and separatist nature of the Dalai Clique.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲，這進一步暴露了達賴集團反華分裂的本質。

sentences.english: We think that has further exposed the anti-China and separatist nature of the Dalai clique.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲，這進一步暴露了達賴集團反華分裂的本質。

sentences.english: Behl. I am anti-china and remain till I die.
sentences.chinese: 我是反華分子，到死都是。

sentences.english: China has no choice but to face all these Western anti-China forces directly.
sentences.chinese: 但中國必須也只能直面西方的這些反華勢力。

sentences.english: HK refuses to be turned into anti-China base.
sentences.chinese: 香港拒絕成爲反華基地。

sentences.english: Vietnam needed this to redirect anti-government sentiments to anti-China.
sentences.chinese: 越南需要將反政府情緒轉成反華。

sentences.english: In 1885 the Canadian government passed the first anti-chinese bill known as The Head Tax.
sentences.chinese: 1885年加拿大政府通過反華的人頭稅法案。

sentences.english: The story was reinforced by a spate of anti-China stories circulating in the media.
sentences.chinese: 這一報道因媒體中出現的大量反華內容而添油加醋。

sentences.english: The overseas anti-China forces advocate "Tibet independence".
sentences.chinese: 國外反華勢力鼓吹“中藏獨立”。

sentences.english: Anti-Chinese sentiment is also deeply rooted in Indonesian culture for the past 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 反華情緒也深深植根於印尼的文化在過去50年。

sentences.english: China foiled once again the anti-China human rights draft resolution in the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 我國在聯合國又一次挫敗反華人權提案。

sentences.english: We are firmly opposed to any foreign countries providing platform for her anti-China separatist activities.
sentences.chinese: 我們堅決反對任何外國爲她的反華分裂活動提供舞臺。

sentences.english: There were also anti-Chinese demonstrations in Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 越南還發生了反華示威遊行。

sentences.english: The comments are so fucking anti-Black and anti-Chinese!
sentences.chinese: 評論是如此該死的反黑人和反華。

definition: to close a country/to exclude foreign contact/closed country (Qing China, North Korea etc)
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
